Html:
Hi all,

i'm new to Gmap. I'm wanna create a simple windows app with Gmap.

I wanna find the nearest facility like Police station, Schools, Hospitals etc from the last marker placed on the map.

the Facilities can be prefixed markers...

any idea...
please help me.....

Rintil

:-( 

thanks in advance......

you may use:

PointLatLng start = new PointLatLng(lat1, lon1);
PointLatLng end = new PointLatLng(lat2, lon2);
MapRoute route = GMapProviders.GoogleMap.GetRoute(start, end, false, false, 15);
